events.title: 70. The plan of the Commander, 4 Corps on the 10th...
events.description: 70. The plan of the Commander, 4 Corps on the 10th April was as follows:— -

events.title: To: THe ComMANDER-IN-CHIEF, ; MEDITERRANEAN. Date:...
events.description: To: THe ComMANDER-IN-CHIEF, ; MEDITERRANEAN. Date: 10th April, 1941.

events.title: 3. Convoys P.Q.14 (23 ships) and Q.P.10 (16 ships)...
events.description: 3. Convoys P.Q.14 (23 ships) and Q.P.10 (16 ships) sailed on 8th and 10th April respectively.
